name: Spark in the Dark (Émeric Coudé, Negikun, Carl Boisvert, Vexys001)
name_original: Spark in the Dark (Émeric Coudé, Negikun, Carl Boisvert, Vexys001)
description:
Your space station exploded and you escaped with a shuttle.  You've crashed on Planet X! Explore the unknown environment to find power cells that lights your way through the darkness of the planet. The goal is to find your lost crewmates!

This prototype was made in 3 weeks as a school assignment at Dawson College, Montreal. The requirement was to create a platform game, with at least one jump mechanic. We implemented a normal jump, a jetpack to hoover, a double jump and a grappling hook system.
